string.name: head1
string.b: How many days advance booking for Gtbus ?

string.name: head2
string.b: How do you write a shipping policy ?

string.name: head3
string.b: What is the cancellation policy in Gtbus ?

string.name: head4
string.b: What is Return Policy of Gtbus ?

string.name: head5
string.b: How do I get a refund from Gtbus ?

resources.string: Advance reservations are made generally up to 30 days in advance for all routes and all buses. The period of advance reservation (ARP) is exclusive of the day of departure of the bus.
No shipping and membership policy in Gtbus. The destination and departure place will be shown on bus ticket.

How can I cancel my bus ticket online? Yes you can cancel your bus ticket at cancellation fee.The following is the cancellation fee: Between 24 hours to 3 days before journey the cancellation charge is 50%. Between 3 days to 7 days before journey the cancellation charge is 25%. Between 7days to 30 days before journey the cancellation charge is 10%.
Gtbus has a standard return policy of 15 days from the date of cancellation .
Our customer support team will help you process the request of refund as per the cancellation policy of Gtbus.
